Strawberry___healthy: Maintain regular watering, good airflow, balanced fertilization, and monitor for early signs of pests or disease.
Grape___healthy: Maintain regular watering, good airflow, balanced fertilization, and monitor for early signs of pests or disease.
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus: Remove and destroy infected plants, disinfect tools, avoid tobacco near tomatoes.

Corn_(maize)___healthy: Maintain regular watering, good airflow, balanced fertilization, and monitor for early signs of pests or disease.
Strawberry___Leaf_scorch: Remove infected leaves, avoid overhead watering, and use disease-resistant varieties.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust: Remove nearby juniper hosts, apply fungicides early in the season.
Potato___Late_blight: Remove infected plants, avoid overhead watering, use certified disease-free seeds, apply fungicide.
Apple___healthy: Maintain regular watering, good airflow, balanced fertilization, and monitor for early signs of pests or disease.
Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight: Rotate crops, plant resistant hybrids, and apply fungicides early if needed.
Tomato___Bacterial_spot: Remove infected leaves, avoid wetting leaves, use copper-based sprays.
Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot: Remove infected parts, avoid wet leaves, use copper sprays.
Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew: Prune to improve airflow, apply sulfur-based fungicide early.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus: Remove infected plants, control whiteflies with insecticidal soap or reflective mulch, and plant resistant varieties.
Peach___Bacterial_spot: Plant resistant varieties, prune to increase airflow, apply copper sprays during dormant season.
Peach___healthy: Maintain regular watering, good airflow, balanced fertilization, and monitor for early signs of pests or disease.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot: Remove infected leaves, improve air circulation, water at the base (not overhead), and apply a copper-based fungicide if needed.
Apple___Black_rot: Prune and destroy infected twigs, apply fungicide, remove mummified fruits.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_: Grow resistant varieties, monitor closely; fungicides usually not needed unless severe.
Tomato___Leaf_Mold: Improve airflow, water early in the day, apply fungicides like chlorothalonil.
Blueberry___healthy: Maintain regular watering, good airflow, balanced fertilization, and monitor for early signs of pests or disease.
Tomato___Early_blight: Remove infected leaves, mulch around base, rotate crops, and apply fungicide.
Raspberry___healthy: Maintain regular watering, good airflow, balanced fertilization, and monitor for early signs of pests or disease.
Tomato___Late_blight: Remove infected plants immediately, apply preventative fungicides, avoid overhead watering.
Apple___Apple_scab: Use resistant varieties, rake fallen leaves, apply fungicides in spring.
Tomato___healthy: Maintain regular watering, good airflow, balanced fertilization, and monitor for early signs of pests or disease.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles): Prune affected wood, sanitize tools, avoid stressing vines with drought or injury.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray: Rotate crops, use resistant hybrids, apply fungicides if early symptoms appear.
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider: Spray plants with water to knock mites off, use insecticidal soap or neem oil.
Pepper,_bell___healthy: Maintain regular watering, good airflow, balanced fertilization, and monitor for early signs of pests or disease.
Cherry_(including_sour)___healthy: Maintain regular watering, good airflow, balanced fertilization, and monitor for early signs of pests or disease.
Squash___Powdery_mildew: Increase airflow, water at soil level, apply sulfur or potassium bicarbonate sprays.
Grape___Black_rot: Prune infected areas, apply fungicide early in the season, and remove fallen debris.
Potato___healthy: Maintain regular watering, good airflow, balanced fertilization, and monitor for early signs of pests or disease.
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo: Remove infected leaves, improve airflow, apply fungicide at early bloom stage.
Tomato___Target_Spot: Remove infected leaves, improve spacing, apply preventative fungicides.
Potato___Early_blight: Rotate crops, remove infected plants, and use fungicides preventatively.
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening): Remove and destroy infected trees, control psyllid insects, plant disease-free trees.
